short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically making fun of your movies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UpFish is a Chrome extension that allows you to modify the audio of your streaming movies.

Out of the box, UpFish can:

  - Turn "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" into
    "Wizard People, Dear Reader", in which Harry and friends swear and drink a lot
  - Turn "Vertigo" into "Fartigo", in which Jimmy Stewart farts a lot
  - Karaoke any music video (remove vocals from the center)

If you can write a little JSON, you can make UpFish do other things, too!
